name: Artisan's Tools
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Tools and Skill Kits/Artisans Tools

sections.body:
TypePriceWeight
Common5 gp5 lbs.
Masterwork55 gp5 lbs.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Tools and Skill Kits/Artisans Tools/Type
sections.name: Type

sections.body: These special tools include the items needed to pursue any single craft. Without them, you have to use improvised tools (–2 penalty on Craft checks), if you can do the job at all.
These tools serve the same purpose as artisan's tools, but masterwork artisan's tools are the perfect tools for the job, so you get a +2 circumstance bonus on Craft checks made with them.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Tools and Skill Kits/Artisans Tools/Masterwork Artisans Tools
sections.name: Masterwork Artisan's Tools
